pre_caption: From a stationary perspective inside a car, the camera captures a medium shot of the two front seats and a wide shot of the exterior scenery. The high-backed seats occupy the foreground on the left and right sides of the frame, with the car's dashboard and center console positioned in the center-middle ground. A person's silhouette is visible in the driver's seat on the right. Initially, the background, seen through the windshield, is a tunnel with yellow lights streaking past, indicating forward motion. The scene then transitions, and the background becomes a dark, rainy road, while raindrops appear on the windshield in the middle ground. The camera remains fixed at the level of the front seats throughout the clip.
